entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 7:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 20 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
